content.title: First of all, have a great time!
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>We’re thrilled</> to have you with us on this epic journey.
In ARK you’ll gather resources, craft items, and build shelters to survive the challenges ahead.

As you explore the world, you’ll encounter many creatures—some friendly, some hostile.
Tame and train them to turn them into valuable allies.

Our server has a friendly, active community that’s happy to help new players.
Join our Discord to stay up to date with news, events, and updates.

<TextStyle.Green>What to expect</>
● Reliable, always-online servers with solid hardware
● Interesting, curated mods
● Balanced settings (and the occasional crazy server for fun!)
● Support from admins, helpers, and fellow players
● Strictly non-toxic environment
● Real influence on server development via suggestions and polls

Thanks for choosing our ASA servers — we hope you have an amazing time!
<TextStyle.Green>Have fun!</>

content.title: This is a PvE server — be respectful.
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>Keyboard shortcuts</>
● F1 – WBUI INFO
● F3 – VOTE
● F4 – REPORT
● F6 – RATE COMMUNITY

Console players can access <TextStyle.Green>function keys</> by holding <TextStyle.Green>X</> on Xbox or <TextStyle.Green>□</> on PlayStation.

When you vote you’ll receive 200 tokens (more for Supporters!).
Use <TextStyle.Green>!Claim</> in <TextStyle.Green>#bot-spam</> on Discord after voting.

<TextStyle.Green>Decay</>:
● Thatch – 4d
● Wood – 8d
● Stone – 12d
● Metal – 16d
● Creatures – 8d

To collect <TextStyle.Green>tokens</> properly, new players should link their in-game character with the website account.
After <TextStyle.Green>connecting accounts</>, all tokens (voting, playtime, Supporter) will auto-assign to your account.

Questions? Join our Discord!

content.title: Please read before you play:
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Instant ban for:</>
● Racism, homophobia, or toxic harassment
● Hacking, cheating, exploiting

<TextStyle.Red>Rules:</>
● Keep the game enjoyable for everyone
● Help fellow survivors
● Don’t block public places (major resources like volcano, spawns, obelisks, artifact caves). Drops & explorer notes are fine.
● Clean up after yourself
● No mass land grabs
● No pillar/foundation spam
● No massive bases — use common sense
● Max: 1 tribe base + 1 personal outpost per player
● No PvP (no attacking players, their structures, or tames)
● No griefing (trapping, blocking resources, etc.)
● No stealing
● Respect base boundaries — don’t build too close
● Avoid excessive breeding to prevent server load
● Don’t beg for help — ask nicely; if someone can, they will 🙂
